column4: i was told that i could cut down an .mpg file, but i am not sure what program i can use to do this... cutting it down? will this shorten the clip? can i choose wich parts to take out?
can anybody tell me what the command is to register this nick? is it "/nickserv register"?
A video editor like LiVES or Cinelerra can chop up MPEGs, or you could even use VLC to stream it to a file, then skip the parts you don't want and they won't get written
